reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Initiative for Improving Standard of Prisons

description.narrative: Strengthen the focus of the sentence of imprisonment on rehabilitation and reintegration through provision of vocational skill trainings and income generation schemes. This is done to improve of the living condition of women prisoners in Ambo Prison. This will enhance the health and resilience to traumatic situation of inmates. The project will also intensify skill training and literacy situation of women inmates to enable them with better knowledge of income generation activities and access to information. It will also help to the successful integration of the inmates to their communities upon completion of prison terms with better socio-economic situation. The beneficiaries are 40 women prisoners in Ambo prison. The co actors are the FLC partner NGO (IISP) and the zonal prison administration of Oromia.
